main.name: Indrajith Patel
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React

work.title: Lead UI Developer
work.description: Part of Enterprise Data Catalog team which enables the customer to find their data with a simple powerful semantic search. Developed Resusable React Components which can be used across multiple applications

work.title: Senior UI Developer
work.description: Part of SAP IoT Application Enablement DevX Team which enables the customers to create IoT Applications using Templates and Reusable controls in SAP WEBIDE. Developed Freestyle and IoT Application Templates which will allow customers to create application with minimal or no Coding

work.title: UI Developer
work.description: Part of R&D team where I developed an Enterprise Asset Management application to showcase IGATE competency in SAPUI5 for SAPPHIRE 2015

projects.title: Job Portal Application
projects.description: This Application is built for both employee and Job seeker. This will let an employee post a job and also the freelancer will be able to view the job posted and will be apply for the job. Once the job is applied, the employee can view the applicant details

projects.title: LinkedIn Clone
projects.description: This is a clone of LinkedIn Application. The cloned version allows the users to post and view the feeds
